generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and lined with parked cars and hedges.

- vegetation: Trees are visible on the left side of the road and hedges are visible along the right sidewalk.
- terrain: Grass is visible on the left side of the road, adjacent to the sidewalk.

- person: A person is visible standing near the rear of a parked car on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road and parked along the right side, including a silver Volkswagen Golf in the foreground.
- truck: A pickup truck is visible in the distance, driving away from the camera.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible mounted on a pole on the right side of the road, near the parked cars.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights along the road.
- fence: A hedge acts as a fence along the right sidewalk, separating it from the buildings.
